body: @penpornk I'm afraid not. `nb->Attr("data_format", ...)` is only allowed to be called exactly once for a single nodebuilder. If we set `data_format` here, the next time we call `nb->Attr("data_format", ...)` will throw an error.
body_html: @penpornk I'm afraid not. nb->Attr("data_format", ...) is only allowed to be called exactly once for a single nodebuilder. If we set data_format here, the next time we call nb->Attr("data_format", ...) will throw an error.
